poi.missing: You have not uploaded a Proof of Income yet!
poi.desc: Upload a Proof of Income to receive automated discounts on classes you take!
poi.example: Examples of Proof of Income include
poi.instruction-1: Navigate to My Account > Proof of Income
poi.instruction-2: Upload a copy of the result to your SDC account
poi.instruction-3: Once you’ve submitted your proof of income, keep an eye out for approval status from SDC!
poi.instruction-4: Upon approval, discounts will automatically apply to your account! Check your account for details on the amount of discount you have been approved for
poi.discount-desc: You have qualified for an income based discount
poi.discount-desc-2: From the Proof of Income on your account, you qualify for a discount that will be automatically applied to your total.
bgc.missing: You have not uploaded a Background check yet!
bgc.desc-1: As volunteering in our programs involves working closely with children and vulnerable persons, we ask that all our volunteers get a Criminal Record Check completed at their local RCMP office. The price of the CRC will be waived with a letter provided from SDC.
bgc.desc-2: Also, please note that the MPM/JELIC is an IN-PERSON math program. If you apply to volunteer for this program, please ensure that you are aware that it is an in-person program and are able to attend the classes at Richmond Quantum Academy (6650-8181 Cambie Rd, Richmond, BC V6X 3X9).
bgc.instruction-1: Under My Account > Background Check - Generate a volunteer letter from SDC
bgc.instruction-2: Use the volunteer letter to obtain a criminal background check letter
bgc.instruction-3: Upload a copy of the result to your SDC account.
bgc.instruction-4: Once you’ve submitted your letter, keep an eye out for approval status from SDC!
bgc.skip: I don’t have a background check yet, but I will provide a CRC by the first day of volunteering.
bgc.first-day-provide: I will provide a CRC by the first day of volunteering
form.volunteer-signup: Thank you for signing up to volunteer!
